org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.event

Interface ObservablePlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<ReaderPlugin>, Configurable, Nameable, ReaderPlugin
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractObservablePlugin, AbstractThreadedObservablePlugin

    public interface ObservablePlugin
extends ReaderPlugin
    The ObservablePlugin interface provides the API to observe readers in plugins.

    Allows subscribed observers to receive a PluginEvent when a reader is connected/disconnected

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ObservablePlugin.PluginObserver
      Interface to be implemented by plugin observers.

    • Method Detail

      • addObserver

        void addObserver(ObservablePlugin.PluginObserver observer)
        Add a plugin observer.

        The observer will receive all the events produced by this plugin (reader connection, disconnection)

        Parameters:
        observer - the observer object

      • removeObserver

        void removeObserver(ObservablePlugin.PluginObserver observer)
        Remove a plugin observer.

        The observer will no longer receive any of the events produced by this plugin.

        Parameters:
        observer - the observer object

      • notifyObservers

        void notifyObservers(PluginEvent event)
        Push a PluginEvent of the ObservablePlugin to its registered observers.
        Parameters:
        event - the event (see PluginEvent)

      • clearObservers

        void clearObservers()
        Remove all observers at once

      • countObservers

        int countObservers()
        Returns:
        the number of observers
